info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 3:42AM CST until January 02 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees expected. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * WHERE...Colorado County. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
